website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech Circle 2 is versatile, responsive and easy to use, but you should only buy this wired model if you don't mind keeping your cam close to a wall outlet.
pros: Logitech's $180 Circle 2 wired security camera is easy to set up and works with Amazon Alexa, Apple HomeKit and Google Assistant for a wide variety of smart home/voice control applications
cons: While this camera can be used indoors or out, it relies on an adapter for power (rather than a rechargeable battery)
Logitech does sell a wire-free Circle 2 camera separately for $200

customer_reviews.title: amazing > Clarity (daylight)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Logitech did a great job with the software updates and the battery life, night vision and speed have improved dramatically. > Battery: lasts a solid week (not watching live, which soaks up battery) > Recharge: takes 4-6 hrs (faster if you remove the camera face) > Microphone: amazing > Clarity day/night: amazing > Coverage area: amazing > Resolution: amazing > Ease of installation: could use a little more detail on the way the camera "pops" off the mount... it's not obvious. > Setup: super easy! > Design: Nailed it! beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.author: Kr4k3n

customer_reviews.title: No motion alerts when you need them.
customer_reviews.text: Moved my camera three times , factored reset according to technical support , but it still misses half of the motion that happens right in front of its face. I’ve walked directly in front of it’s lens and it won’t see me — but fireflies — I have some awesome videos of fireflies. Thanks but no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Easley

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SLOW to connect and watch live cam!
customer_reviews.text: Camera is SUPER SLOW to « wake up from low power state » and then to « establish a secure connection ». Takes over a minute and a half to start viewing live video... Cameras cost an arm and a leg, way to over priced for what it is... Speakers for the 2 way audio are way to weak, you can barely hear any sound coming out of the camera, forget using this as a security camera... Need to pay for an additional subscription to have motion detection features! I don’t recommend this camera to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Karim Aziz

customer_reviews.title: great color and clearness to see who is commingor going on your property  love the aspect you can do your own monitering
customer_reviews.text: Once I had Logitech help with installation and set up it sure works wonderfully and with no hassle the camera is amazing in clarity and the battery life is very good all I can say is I wish the charging time was shorter but it definetely takes a good 4 hours or more t get them thoroughly charged and the reset button on the side isn't clearly marked and hard to keep pressed down but once they walk you through it its a piece a cake glad I didn't return it and called around to get them to work properly the Logitech people couldn't be nicer to work with !!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Very slow notifications and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection alerts are very slow. Can take tens of seconds before you get an alert, by which time anyone at door has been and gone, so useless for interacting with people at door. Then when I tried to remove camera from mount to replace battery very flimsy mounts broke. Contacted Logitech, who promptly sent the wrong part. I notified them and asked for the correct part. They never got back to me. Camera is essentially useless to me at this point. Bought Eufy instead - instant alerts, longer battery life. More expensive, but it seems like you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: formula155

customer_reviews.title: FIND ANOTHER CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: When the camera connects to WiFi it offers all of the features you would expect and with excellent video quality. The 2 huge issues are basically the same...poor connectivity / staying connected to WiFi...this is a camera issue not a system issue AND when it does work it takes forever to wake up from sleep/battery saving mode...even though I have this brand new camera plugged in. I DO NOT RECOMMEND the battery version under any circumstances......BTW IT IS Always a MAJOR EFFORT TO RECONNECT TO WIFI
customer_reviews.author: Mrc

customer_reviews.title: Awful product from end to end
customer_reviews.text: First off, had to find out the hard way that the wireless version isn't home kit compatible, which didn't ruin things for me to be honest. Its the awful video buffering I get when viewing motion events. The quality isn't the greatest, but not terrible. The app is clunky, but again not the worst. Everything about this product is just... mehh. The fact that they even try to charge for their service is an absolute joke. Also, the stand sucks with the battery as it gets tops heavy and can't stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R.

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Circle 2 Indoor/Outdoor Wireless Home Security Camera
customer_reviews.text: In order for the wireless circle 2 camera to work, you MUST have very strong wifi signal. Otherwise, don't even bother to try and set it up. In my case, I bought the window mount and converted my circle 2 from wireless to wired camera and also bought the linksys AC1900 extender to extend the wifi range. So far, it is working perfectly without any signal loss. For the features: 1) Night Vision - not so great 2) Motion detection - hit and misses 3) Picture quality - excellent during the day time, not so great at night Therefore, only two stars rating because I had to spend the extra money to get it working.
customer_reviews.author: Madmax

customer_reviews.title: Too slow
customer_reviews.text: Way too slow to pick up any movement. Also takes forever to load the live view. I would quite frankly not recommend this product. It might be good for in home use but just doesn't pick up things fast enough outdoors. UPDATED REVIEW EDIT 04/29/2020 Since my last review the camera is no longer being found by my phone app and will not reset. It no longer connects to my wifi or phone and is basically a brick now. I tried contacting Logi Circle but it was just out of warranty and they only offered a 30% off coupon to buy it again. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Y.

customer_reviews.title: Work great and keep improving
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. We use this inside the house to monitor our dogs when we are gone. I have a mesh WiFi network and it works great. I only had to reset one time when it lost WiFi connection and I’ve had it for 4 months. Picture quality is great, I’ve set it to automatically turn on when both of our phones are outside of the house. I’ve set the motion up higher and increased the recording time. Only charge it about every two weeks. Probably around 10-14 days.
customer_reviews.author: NH

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality box, Firmware update couldn’t finish, circle 2 couldn’t boot
customer_reviews.text: So firstly, the box was completely discolored upon arrival with rips on the outside with no apparent damage to the outer amazon box. I have to think the vendor Olive Branch Enterprises is at fault keeping these camera stored in poor condition. The sticker protecting the camera box from tamper was also gone. And unsurprisingly the camera couldn’t fully boot or update firmware. The green led would blink twice and immediately restart over and over again. Waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyAlan

customer_reviews.title: non-powered logitech circle 2 - batteries don't last for squat
customer_reviews.text: title says it all ... be prepared to re-charge every 2-3 weeks ... getting sick of this ... go with the POWERED units please!! pictures are good ... i do run 1080p (because hey, 720 isn't sufficient resolution to capture details in case of burglary/theft/etc.) again, good camera, bad battery.
customer_reviews.author: TJF@Denver

customer_reviews.title: Falls off mount bracket to easy
customer_reviews.text: The mount bracket has only 4 small clips to support the weight of camera, while trying to mount it on house, it kept falling off, hitting the pavement, did some internal damaged, camera only senses movement within 6 to 7 feet straight in front of eye. I purchased 4 yrs Scott trade insurance but it was not covered for accidents such as hitting the pavement, only for malfunction of camera, they declined insurance coverage
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the wired Logi circle cameras
customer_reviews.text: The wired cameras work great but this piece of crap is basically a paper weight. Maybe it’s made worse by the distance from my house (the wired works fine out there) because it doesn’t transmit as strong but this camera essentially never wakes up for any motion and just sits there till it’s batter does without ever even sending an image.
customer_reviews.author: SeanReynoldsCS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 Circle2 wired window mounted cameras that I have been struggling with for 3 years. They were easy to set up. However, the camera resolution is poor both night & day making them useless as security cameras. Moving objects are pixilated or blurred more often than not & playback of captured videos takes so long to upload for viewing that most of the time my device turns off before the video will play. Customer service has not been able to fix these issues & the latest excuse about the pixelated moving objects is that I have dual pane windows. I say BS to that. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT support HomeKit
customer_reviews.text: Turns out this product does NOT support HomeKit secure video ... for some reason only the wired version (which is twice as expensive!) does. So I’ll be returning it — I’m not sending video of my back yard to some sketchy cloud service with no end-to-end encryption.
customer_reviews.author: Jens Alfke

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: First unit the WiFi did not work. Second unit the reset button does not work so now I can never ever change the WiFi is on and it keeps telling me the connection with the servers not strong enough so basically picks up NOTHING unless you watch the LiveView. Waste of time and money. Oh and it does not work with Apple HomeKit as advertised, it simply says Wireless does not work with Apple HomeKit.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Was pleasantly surprised that was very easy to setup and now I’m able to watch the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it because of Amazon fire TV and an Echo and heard that this camera works with Alexa. So thought I would give this a shot. Was pleasantly surprised that was very easy to setup and now I’m able to watch the camera on my TV using Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend the wireless camera
customer_reviews.text: I have the wired version of this camera and love it, but the wireless version is very slow to engage on motion detection, as a matter of fact, you can walk through the room before it wakes up. I am going to return this due to poor performance.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonHumm

customer_reviews.title: Watch out! Received a refurbished item!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item from this listing and received what is clearly a used, refurbished item. Scratches, dents, and all around dirty camera and peripherals. The seller in this case was "Olive Branch Enterprises". Obviously it's hard to track unique sellers as it's mostly obfuscated by amazon on purpose, so just keep an eye out for this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tee & Dee

customer_reviews.title: No DAY at a Glance
customer_reviews.text: A nice camera but the app has something to be said !! Takes too long to wake up !! The Day At a glace only works on certain days
customer_reviews.author: Rodger B. Terrey

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: We do not have Alexa, And wasn’t sure about solar charging it, Or due to the location If our WiFi would reach it, but WiFi reaches it and we are very pleased with this camera and are considering purchasing another solar powered one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great night vision
customer_reviews.text: Love these cameras! We use them to watch our animals in different cages and love the night vision feature! They work amazing, sometimes they have connectivity issues or look framey, but it usually resolves in time. We have several of these and will definitely buy more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: GeekBush

customer_reviews.title: The replacement works well...
customer_reviews.text: The item I order was found defective, replacement is on it's way. will let you know then... Now I received the replacement, installed it and it works A OK. Installed it outside just before it started raining. Have to make a little cover for it, the lance got wet little bit and it would be better with some covering. I'm very please with the cam and it's performance. The support received from Logitech and Amazone was excellent,
customer_reviews.author: Edwardzareb

customer_reviews.title: Camera mount broke apart inserting peg into camera
customer_reviews.text: I inserted the mounting peg into the back of the camera. The camera mount back plate popped off. Upon inspection found the tiny mount columns that the screws fasten too broke off. I felt I did not put an unusual amount of pressure. Just be aware that the mount is fragile. I have not used the camera yet since I cannot mount it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: First off the battery was defective when it arrived and trying to get a replacement was total frustration, though I did eventually get a replacement after many emails and phone calls. Next we move on to the camera itself which seemed to go offline every few hours and needed to be reset physically by rebooting the camera itself until finally it failed to reboot and is offline permanently at this point. I would have thought for almost $170 the product would better and customer support would be at least somewhat responsive, I was sadly mistaken on both counts.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. Made me realize the cleaning guy my crap HOA sends just takes a leaf blower and blows all the dirt and cobwebs around.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed nothing but issues since day 1. Camera didn’t pick up movement and after using for 2 weeks went offline. I tried to reset per directions and camera still blinks magenta and blue. Now I can’t get it to work after unplugging etc...when camera went offline it stated battery was at 92%. Very dissatisfied with this and now can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: MStellema

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 9 months.  So real support
customer_reviews.text: Impressive for 9 months, then, ... The video went gray static though audio continued to work. This fixed it self but then lost WiFi 2 days latter and the unit is unable to connect. Still waiting for support as Logitech must have fired their support staff.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: First, off you have to have an iphone to set this up. My Samsung Galaxy s9 plus would not let me do it. Second, the motion detection is terrible. You have to be almost 3 ft from it for it to turn on. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only works with Alexa if you're prepared to jump through hoops
customer_reviews.text: I've been happy with Logitech computer peripherals, so I figured this would be OK. Set up is a pain, and then trying to get it to work with Alexa is even more pain. Not worth the time and effort. Go for another option.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Wire free version will not be recognized by App.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to using another product from Logitech, however this does not work. Followed every suggestion for the App to recognize the camera to no avail. The camera reset button did not produce the expected light signal. Many reboots of phone and camera did nothing to resolve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald C. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Save time.  Buy the wired version.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother. Like others say, it CANNOT seem to stay online. USELESS. The wired version BTW is excellent and functions without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera, I have multiple ones, though I try the battery 100% wireless but the battery doesn’t last as promised, after like a day battery runs out ....
customer_reviews.author: Oldemar Fallas

customer_reviews.title: Flawed motion detection, good camera
customer_reviews.text: Horrible delay for notification. I knew a package was arriving and needed to speak to delivery rep... I had to leave it open in order to reach them. Notification takes a minute or two and then connecting time is another minute or two.
customer_reviews.author: Ross J. Patti

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Battery Life, Slow response.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased last week. Charged fully, used default settings, battery lasted TWO DAYS. Unit takes several minutes to send a notification. Not happy at all with this performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great day and night pic
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these already. I have used it for a few years. It even caught a their rummaging thru our pickup. So easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Mom on the move

customer_reviews.title: Not good for outside
customer_reviews.text: Works much better indoors than outdoors. It's really NOT outdoors ready. It malfunctions when out in the elements. Requires a reliable power source. The compatible Solar panel does not produce enough power to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Mocha Bear

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. It super slow turning on and I rarely picked up any motion, maybe one time out of ten. Didn't want to go with the wired version but it looks like I'm going to have to. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylene

customer_reviews.title: Overall a pretty good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is very sharp. Love the small size and overall design of the camera. One bit of frustration was connecting the app to the camera. It failed so many times. I had to reset it a couple of times and it finally got going.
customer_reviews.author: FELIX BURGOS

customer_reviews.title: Not for Apple
customer_reviews.text: Not for iOS or HomeKit. This is pathetic and BS.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Does not support HomeKit as advertised on Apple’s Website
customer_reviews.text: Listed on Apple’s Website as HomeKit compatible. This is total BS. It does not support HomeKit, and I will likely be requesting a refund
customer_reviews.author: Rand Gravely

customer_reviews.title: One works great, the other.....
customer_reviews.text: one I use at home works excellent One an hour away at job works ok. Very slow and sometimes offline but I suspect it may be due to I’m using a hotspot . Not far away but there is a metal wall and door separating a hotspot extender and the cam
customer_reviews.author: Master

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with homekit
customer_reviews.text: Why make some products that work with homekit and others that do not?
customer_reviews.author: Highlander

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: We own two other logi camera and love them, this one not so much. Battery will not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up. Easy to connect to Free APP. Notifies me of all motion. Keeps battery life for at least 2 weeks. Easy to charge. Absolutely love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Slow notification & terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Battery life is terrible. Doesn't last a week before needing charging. Notification of activity is way too slow.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Like many others here
customer_reviews.text: Like many others here, this camera is non-functional for me. About half the time it will not connect (right next to the router, all other devices functioning flawlessly) and when it does work, the battery charges for two days and lasts for maybe 3. Terrible product, I had high hopes. I'm returning, don't bother purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: BigRed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best camera out there. Alerts when anyone come near my property
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Pennell

customer_reviews.title: Battery not nearly good enough for practical use
customer_reviews.text: Tried one of these Wireless Circle 2's to add to my existing Circle 2 collection (have several Wired models around the house). The battery would last no longer than 3 days with what I thought was limited use. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: "dc_mac_user"

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: It is very unreliable. When you put the camera off because you are home and want privacy it is very hard to to put back online when you must need it. Very unhappy right now especially because I am paying a fee by month.
customer_reviews.author: jackeline padilha

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies fast
customer_reviews.text: Its pk. I wish i would have shopped a round
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for checked items
customer_reviews.text: Cannot give a full review of this product because when I received it the battery was unable to hold a charge. I will be paying closer attention to reviews and the amazon warehouse certified.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Mccune

customer_reviews.title: Terrible camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: first one sent never worked for set up. second one sent worked for a day and then discontinued working after set up. Was out of town and couldn't return until now.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Logitech wireless cameras
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the cameras are good for the price. We did have trouble with one of them after a rainstorm as the screen appeared snowy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Burcham

customer_reviews.title: RUN!  Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: It sounds nice in theory. Battery lasts about 2 days before needing recharging.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera because I’m away from home a lot. I use it to see and talk to my kids when I’m away which has worked well so far. Since I’ve bought it I’ve received two FW updates Already. What does that really mean?
customer_reviews.author: MAR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Picture is amazing even when it rains. No complains about this product
customer_reviews.author: LARanger

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: The battery last approximately 1 week at the most. We made sure that no additional factors come into to play and yet it has a short battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Night vision is awful on these cameras. App software is sub-par compared to competitors
customer_reviews.author: kdb9904

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, terrible unless plugged in
customer_reviews.text: In brief: wanted this camera because it was battery powered. But it's worthless on battery power. Takes a full minute to wake up from low power mode and start recording when it sees movement. Which means it misses basically every event that happens at my front door. I complained, they sent me a new one. The new one is just as bad and the battery barely hold a charge on this unit. Anyway, don't buy this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: received used product
customer_reviews.text: dirty surface and broken parts, tested CAM is work but very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Mingoffline

customer_reviews.title: Refurbised camera
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work, and im having difficulties send it back to Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Takeshi Tanaka Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Why would anyone buy this?  Even the setup doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: 1. The S/N matches a Circle not the Circle 2 I purchased. 2. I've tried to set it up 4 times and the firmware never works. 3. The support site less than friendly. I'm not sure why anyone would buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Roland M. Brenny

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase for security reasons
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be charged every 4-7 days and takes 8 hours to charge up. It will Push notfiy you all day while your home, cause you're in the room working, playing, cleaning It Easily comes off its mount any 5 year old can, theif, stranger. Anyone can. It snaps on and off the mount with ease. 10-15 secound delay for “LIVE” video feed. Sorry you just missed me...
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Price is not right
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done, most of the time. Light sensors and adjustments do not work most times. If a single light is on in a dark room, the camera focuses on it and the rest of the room is not visible... easy to exploit. Really wish more thought went into this product at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I can't get it through the setup part. it stalls at connecting to cloud. I also bought the window mount but that requires it to become a wired unit. I am returning both pieces of garbage ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wiegand

customer_reviews.title: Battery is awful, but camera is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Battery doesn't last very long at all, and it is very difficult to get it to wake up. However, the camera can be popped out and put in a wired housing, or wireless (window) housing with no issues..
customer_reviews.author: John M. Patterson, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to setup. I got the Wire-Free camera so I can put it anywhere but then decided to have the power cable plugged in so now it is a camera with battery backup! Something for Logitech to think about!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler T

customer_reviews.title: Camera Not Working
customer_reviews.text: Can't pair the camera, led keeps blinking amber and i cant use it. Already posted on Logitech support but it seems that they are having this problem a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Neiva

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This camera sucks—save your money. I have one that is offline nonstop despite fully charged battery and great internet connection. The one in the back yard it great but now I will either go with nest or ring
customer_reviews.author: Sheri V Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Works great..
customer_reviews.text: Works great....I had no problems at all. Lots of bad reviews but this is my second one and they both work well. Plus you at least get 24hrs of recording for free with smart alerts....paid features on other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Commander

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, I have them all around my house inside & out connected through the WiFi. The quality is so clear & the motion detection is quick to capture. These are rechargeable & battery lasts on his much motion detection is catches. For example my living room & kitchen has the most detection so these need charge about once a week & outside camera world need about once a month. Tech support is great & give quick response to any issue you have.
customer_reviews.author: EDimas

product_meta.title: Logitech Circle 2 Indoor/Outdoor Wireless Home Security Camera Works with Alexa & Google Assistant with Easy Setup, 1080p HD, 180° Wide-Angle, Night Vision, 2-Way Talk, Alerts, Free 24-Hours Storage
product_meta.description: Configuration:SingleMeet Circle 2, the only indoor and outdoor, weatherproof, wired or 100% wire-free 1080p full HD home security camera with night vision and up to 180° wide-angle field-of-view that you can set up in minutes, and goes just about anywhere. You can count on your footage being secure. Every Circle 2 security camera is digitally signed and comes with 24-hours of free AES 256 Bit Dual Layer Encryption storage in your own secure private cloud. No matter where you are, only you have access to your footage using your Logi Circle mobile app or Web App. Key features include: 1080p full HD video, 180-degree wide-angle view, Night vision up to 15-feet, Free 24-hour secure cloud storage, Free smart alerts with snapshots, Two-way talk speaker and microphone. Premium features include: Person detection, Motion zones, custom Time-lapse Day Briefs and additional storage options available through Circle Safe Home subscriptions. Circle 2 Wire-Free Camera integrates seamlessly with your smart home and works with Amazon Alexa and The Google Assistant. Circle 2, it’s whole home security made simple. Multiple camera support .
feature_bullets: CIRCLE 2 WIRE-FREE is an easy to install, wireless, Wi-Fi connected home security camera that records 10 to 60-second videos when motion is detected and stores the footage in your secure, private cloud, works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant

RECHARGEABLE BATTERY -- operates in low power mode where the camera wakes up when it detects motion to record, and when watching the live stream (takes approximately 25-seconds to load), then goes to sleep to conserve battery life
FULL HD WIDE-ANGLE VIDEO WITH NIGHT VISION lets you capture the really big picture with 180-degree wide-angle lens, full 1080p HD video day or night, with night vision that’s visible up to 15-feet
FREE 24-HOUR SECURE CLOUD STORAGE - Stores 10 to 60-second motion based videos up to 24-hours in your own private cloud for free, secured using bank level encryption
FREE SMART ALERTS WITH SNAPSHOTS - Get mobile app notifications with a thumbnail image of the motion detected, to "see" what's happening at home without opening the app
TWO-WAY TALK - Take action if needed by utilizing the built-in speaker and microphone to connect with whatever's happening at home instantly
FREE SMART TIME-LAPSE DAY BRIEF - Avoid spending hours sorting through footage and see a 30-second timelapse video recapping the most important moments of your day

ADVANCED PAID FEATURES include Person Detection, Motion Zones, custom Time-lapse Day Briefs and additional days of storage – every new camera comes with a free 10-day trial to experience these features

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.9 out of 5 stars239 ratings2.9 out of 5 stars
